Name: Seabreeze Special Lv.2
Description: Recommended for Frost Mage, Verdant Oracle, and Soul Musician.
Description2$english: Using the most familiar ingredients to the people of Asterleeds for stewing, presenting the dish that best represents this seaside city on the day of celebration. Happy Seabreeze Festival!

recipes.Name: Seabreeze Festival Selection
recipes.Des:
Crafting yields products Lv.1, Lv.2, and Lv.3 at rates of 50%, 40%, and 10%, respectively.
Simmered with the most beloved ingredients of the Asterians, this dish embodies the soul of this Seaside city—presented in all its glory during days of celebration. Happy Seabreeze Festival!

NeedMaterial.Name: Exquisite Raw Meat
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Top-tier processed fresh meat, not only retaining the ultimate flavor but also achieving a perfect balance of fat and lean through exquisite Artisanship, requiring only a skilled cook to transform it into a feast for gourmets.

recipes.Name: Exquisite Raw Meat
recipes.Des:
Can process beast meat into Exquisite Raw Meat that can be used as a top-grade ingredient.
This process yields 6-7 products.

NeedMaterial.Name: Raw Shiny Meat
NeedMaterial.Description: After processing​, it can be used for delicious cooking.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Meat obtained from wild creatures, the final taste depends entirely on the adventurer's cooking skills.

NeedMaterial.Name: Granny Pine
NeedMaterial.Description: Used for cooking, making delicious dishes.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A rare underwater fungus regarded as a treasure beneath the sea.

NeedMaterial.Name: Butter
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Rich in nutrients but high in fat, so don't overconsume it.

recipes.Name: Butter
recipes.Des: Rich in nutrients but high in fat, so don't overconsume it.

NeedMaterial.Name: Fresh Milk
NeedMaterial.Description: A raw material that can be reprocessed by life professions.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: The pure white nectar that fuels morning energy.

NeedMaterial.Name: Nine-Flavor Spice
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: As the name suggests. Just a little bit can make ordinary food exude a charming and rich flavor. One bite, and it instantly hits your taste buds!

recipes.Name: Nine-Flavor Spice
recipes.Des: As the name suggests. Just a little bit can make ordinary food exude a charming and rich flavor. One bite, and it instantly hits your taste buds!

NeedMaterial.Name: Scallop
NeedMaterial.Description: An item found during wilderness exploration.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A sharp-shelled scallop that grows along the beaches of the Asteria Plains. Juicy and full of flavor.

NeedMaterial.Name: Raw Fish Meat
NeedMaterial.Description: After processing​, it can be used for delicious cooking.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: The meat obtained from swimming fish, the final taste completely depends on the adventurer's cooking skills.
